job description:
Loveland Innovations

Job Title: Data Scientist

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $90k - $140K Depending on Experience

Join our growing development team and make a real contribution as we create innovative solutions around drone imagery. Improve our industry leading AI and explore new and effective applications of the latest literature to solve real world challenges.

We're looking for an experienced data scientist that has previously worked on delivering solutions for complex problems around deep learning and computer vision for large-scale distributed systems. Possible projects include damage detection, classification, instance segmentation and GANs for data augmentation.

Requirements:
  • MS/PhD or related experience with specialization in machine learning
  • Broad machine learning knowledge regarding AI, Deep Learning, Clustering, GANs, etc.
  • Knowledge of Python, NumPy, TensorFlow or similar libraries and toolkits
  • Strong programming skills and experience writing performance optimized production-level code
  • Development experience with the ability to define and implement software development best practices including domain-driven and test-driven development
Benefits:
  • Medical and dental insurance (80% of premiums paid by Loveland Innovations)
  • Generous PTO allocation
  • Choose your hardware we're really flexible
  • Stocked fridge
  • Stock options
  • Startup with a soul we work hard and are passionate about what we are doing, but also have families and lives outside of work. This is a unique opportunity to work at a well-funded startup with a proven management team with a long history of success working together.
This position will reside in Utah. No relocation assistance is available. All job offers are contingent on a background check that complies with the law.
